name: Battery (Pumpkinshoo)
description:
Battery is a 2D platformer-puzzle  game made for BTP Game Jam #3 with a theme Less is More

in this game, if the battery have less energy the more jump and more move speed

How To Play:

A & D move left & right.

Space to jump.

Q to change other battery.

E to transfer battery energy by standing above other battery.

to interact a switch for the door, the battery must be at least have 1 energy.
